title: Satan
desc:
Post 1396
- Played in the identity zone.
- Can also be played if someone has already won.
- While you are below 15 cards, all players draw a card when you take a turn, including yourself.
- While you are below 15 cards, everyone's goal (Except yours) becomes: *Be the player with the least cards in hand at the end of the game, other than Satan*.
- When someone becomes ðŸ†” **Satan**, the game will automatically end in 5 rounds and you will win, cancelled if **Satan** reaches or is in 15 cards.
